web-development.name: Resume site
web-development.techUsed: React.js, Git, Figma, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Animate, Router-dom, Canva
web-development.description: Created a responsive resume site (this site) using React.js. The source code is in GitHub. Design was made using Figma, following the common UI/UX design patterns. Stored written content in JSON format to mimic NoSQL database.

web-development.name: Server configuration
web-development.description: The original deliverables was a series of markdown files on the following network commands: NGINX, tracert and dig. Then, I used those files to create a documentation site using React.js

web-development.name: Spotify playlist
web-development.description: This app allows user to type in a query that sends an asynchronous requests to the Spotify API. Users can also create and update their playlist using the app. App is made with React.js using. Note: This is a homemade project for personal use
